inputs.name: variablePrefix
inputs.label: Variable prefix for output variable set, like BODY, STATUS, STATUSTEXT and HEADERS.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable prefix for output variable set, default is RESPONSE_BODY, RESPONSE_STATUS, RESPONSE_STATUSTEXT and RESPONSE_HEADERS.

inputs.name: poolingRetries
inputs.label: Number of poolingRetries
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Number of `pooling Retries` for non valid responses.
> Set to `0` **if NO want pooling**.
See [Activating Pooling](https://github.com/alelltech/azdo-http-axios?tab=readme-ov-file#activating-pooling)

inputs.name: poolingUntil
inputs.label: Pooling expression
inputs.helpMarkDown:
ECMAScript pooling expression to stop pooling.
> Set to `empty` **if NO want pooling**.
See [Activating Pooling](https://github.com/alelltech/azdo-http-axios?tab=readme-ov-file#activating-pooling)

inputs.name: poolingDelay
inputs.label: Pooling delay in milis
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delay in milis for pooling interval.
